resources.string: Select the nap duration for this widget:
Alarm will ring at %1$s. Have a good rest.
Ok, I\'ll wake up. I need some coffee
Alarm will ring again in 7 minutes.

Take a quick nap with the Napply widget.


Long click on home screen

Choose Widget > Napply

Configure nap time

Just tap on the widget: alarm is setup, and silent mode is on


You just need to know this:


We use the default system alarm volume and ringtone

When the alarm rings, you can face the handset toward the floor to snooze it
